title: Ticket #5023: document variables available for use in submit file
description:
There are a set of predefined submit variables that may be used within a submit description file. $Cluster and $Process$ are mentioned many places, but never formally defined. So, these variables should be listed and described.

With new features for for queuing jobs, there are also 

  $Item


  $ItemIndex


  $Row


  $Step
check_ins: 2015-Apr-28 11:36   Check-in [44735]: Add definitions of automatic variables defined with submit, and give one complete example #5023 (By Karen Miller )
